name: Bruce A. QUARLES, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY and the Superior Court of Pennsylvania, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Quarles v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Bruce A. QUARLES, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY and the Superior Court of Pennsylvania, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of May, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and the Application for Relief are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
44 A.3d 1148
Bruce A. QUARLES, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY and the Superior Court of Pennsylvania, Respondents.
No. 26 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 15, 2012.
